TopicTitle: F12 key overlaps with Steam’s screenshot key

Articles.Content:
Precondition: In flight mode, game started from Steam launcher, Steam overlay active

To reproduce:

  1.  Press F12
    • Expected: Steam screenshot taken
    • Observed: Aero UI comes up, then Steam screenshot is taken with it
  2. Press F12 again
    • Expected: Aero UI dismissed 
    • Observed: Yes, but another screenshot taken, without the UI

 Platform: Windows 11, i5 12600 KF, RTX 3080

 Suggested fix: Add alt modifier key to bring up UI
Or you could just reassign your steam screenshot key...
I can, but that’s a workaround. The game should respect the defaults. It’s just polite.
